alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Henderson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henderson and southeastern Buncombe Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mountain Home, or 4 miles north of Hendersonville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Mills River, Fletcher, Mountain Home, Laurel Park, Valley Hill, Edneyville, and Dana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
